value:
$WmMPID_比翼ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_FM_Pair,Face|None can challenge the strength
of our bond! Right, Sothe?$k$p$nMPID_サザ|Just let them try it.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|Don't think for one second that this
outfit will keep me from protecting
my dear husband.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ラフィエル,ch11_17_Raphael_M_Wedding20,Face|And I will ensure your safety in turn,
my queen.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁オボロ,ch05_06_Oboro_F_Wedding20,Face|Hey, Hinata! Be careful out there.
You don't want to mess up your
kimono! ...You hear me, Hinata?$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ヒナタ,ch05_03_Hinata_M_Wedding20,Face|Sure, sure, sure... Now, C'MON!
Let's do this!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|My Queen...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|Oh, hello! Enjoying yourself, Leanne?$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|All the brides...so beautiful. I...
I wish...me too.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|Hm. I see why Rafiel is getting
bent out of shape...$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|What do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|Come, Leanne.$k$pYou have only just reunited after
so long apart. Be patient with him.
Besides, there's no need to rush.$k$pOf course, the heart wants what
it wants, no denying that...$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|I see. But someday...I will marry...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|Indeed you will! And when that
day comes, Hatari will celebrate
in kind.$k$pBut for now, let's not distract
anyone with any of those ideas.
Just for a little while longer...$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|Hee hee! I can't wait...$k$p$Sbs150|
